name: black-highlighter
description: Modern base theme for the SCP Wiki (build process)

scripts.watch: npm run watchbase --bhl-i=src/css/black-highlighter.css --bhl-o=dist/css/black-highlighter.css --bhl-env=development & npm run watchbase --bhl-i=src/css/normalize.css --bhl-o=dist/css/normalize.css --bhl-env=development & npm run watchbase --bhl-i=src/css/black-highlighter.css --bhl-o=dist/css/min/black-highlighter.min.css --bhl-env=production & npm run watchbase --bhl-i=src/css/normalize.css --bhl-o=dist/css/min/normalize.min.css --bhl-env=production
